channel.title: Unabel to full login
channel.description:
Ok first i wanna say if you think u gonna help read EVERYTHING end not a part! I am dutch and writing mistakes can happen sorry for that .
Ok so when i am on the login screen end i fill in my name end pass end press login it start's to login server.bat pic: [img]http://UpThisImg.com/images/36dd.bmp[/img]
As you can see it log's in end then it just logout without any warning (only see loading screen then again login screen)
The fault is 90% sure in Client.java or a small chance in Player.java
I might have deleted something wrong but wasn't able to found it
If you guy's can help me in wich direction i need to search would be helpfull
Thanks

item.title: Unabel to full login

@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

That isn’t the login method.
[/quote]

those command lines are the login procedure

I dont know what you mean els with login method[/quote]

The entire login process, method name should be: initialize.

Read full topic

item.title: Unabel to full login
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

dutchly:

Maybe Try A New Source?

If you dont know what it is dont spam please .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 12, 2009, 01:30:31 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Owned_Pl0xs, post:4, topic:319139”]Show me the login method.[/quote]

private void directFlushOutStream() throws java.io.IOException {
	out.write(outStream.buffer, 0, outStream.currentOffset);
	outStream.currentOffset = 0;		// reset
}
private void fillInStream(int forceRead) throws java.io.IOException {
	inStream.currentOffset = 0;
	in.read(inStream.buffer, 0, forceRead);
}

I dident touch them so i dont think it’s there fault because it log’s in but only when trying to load something it crash without giving an error

Read full topic
